hero.subtitle4: Explore chef-style recipes that bring out the best in every dish.

about.title: Our Story
about.paragraph-1: Founded in 2012, Foodwealth Ltd produces, imports, packages, and distributes premium herbs, spices, and culinary products. Our mission is to combine quality with authenticity, delivering flavors that inspire trust and elevate everyday cooking.
about.paragraph-2: We serve retailers, wholesalers, and foodservice providers across Southeastern Europe, including Greece, Bulgaria, and the Balkans, bringing authentic flavors and innovative products to kitchens everywhere.

brands.title: Discover Our Brands
brands.paragraph: Trusted names from around the world, carefully selected for quality and authenticity.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Explore our wide range of premium herbs, spices, and blends — carefully selected to bring authentic flavors to every kitchen.

recipes.subtitle: Explore creative ways to use our premium herbs and spices.

partners.title: Our Partners

hero.title: Quality & Authenticity in Every Blend
hero.subtitle: Bringing premium herbs, spices, and culinary products to Southeastern Europe since 2012

aboutUs.title: Excellence in Herbs, Spices & Culinary Products
aboutUs.para1: Founded in 2012, Foodwealth Ltd has become a trusted name in the production, importation, packaging, and distribution of premium herbs, spices, and culinary products throughout Southeastern Europe. Our mission is clear: to combine quality with authenticity, delivering flavors that inspire trust and elevate everyday cooking
aboutUs.para2: We serve a diverse range of partners including retailers, wholesalers, and foodservice providers across Greece, Bulgaria, and the Balkans. Our comprehensive approach ensures that whether you're stocking shelves, supplying restaurants, or creating menu innovations, you have access to products that meet the highest standards.
aboutUs.para3: Every product in our portfolio reflects our commitment to excellence. From careful sourcing and precise blending to professional packaging and reliable distribution, we bring authentic flavors and innovative products to kitchens everywhere in the region.
